data.name: Make It Count
data.descr: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty within 20 minutes of Drakos the Interrogator's death.
data.tooltip:
Make It Count

Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty within 20 minutes of Drakos the Interrogator\'s death.

data.name: Ruby Void

Ruby Void

data.name: Experienced Drake Rider
data.descr: On three different visits to The Oculus, get credit for defeating Ley-Guardian Eregos while riding an Amber, Emerald, and Ruby drake on Heroic Difficulty.
data.tooltip:
Experienced Drake Rider

On three different visits to The Oculus, get credit for defeating Ley-Guardian Eregos while riding an Amber, Emerald, and Ruby drake on Heroic Difficulty.

Criteria:
- Amber Drake
- Ruby Drake
- Emerald Drake
